i18n.footer: You can select a different language from the dropdown menu.

club-create.title: New club
club-create.name: Club name
club-create.descriptionText: You can create your own club. It can be open to everyone or private—members can only join via an invite link.
club-create.adminsText: Want to add administrators? Enter their Telegram usernames separated by commas — they’ll be able to manage events and club members. You also can do it later.
